englishText:
The Workflow is divided into several stages:
EIGUGO - this is the stage where we first meet over a phone call and decide what are the goals of your plan.
DAKISHAM - this is our first meeting where we build the plan for the home of your dreams.
TATARE DESUKA - signing our contract where we agree upon the terms and conditions of our together.
GONO MANOTE - the recurrent meetings we have and visits to home decor stores and carpenters to realize the vision we first set.
